translations.landing.about.hero.description: We're building the future of workflow automation - transparent, verifiable, and human-first.
translations.landing.about.hero.title: About Flyto2
translations.landing.about.mission.description: Automation should empower people, not replace them. We believe in tools that enhance human capabilities while keeping you in control.
translations.landing.about.mission.statement: To make powerful automation accessible to everyone, while maintaining transparency and human oversight.

translations.landing.about.values.humanOversight.desc: Every automation can be paused, inspected, and adjusted. You're always in control.
translations.landing.about.values.localFirst.descript: Your data stays on your machine. No hidden cloud calls, no data harvesting.
translations.landing.about.values.localFirst.title: Local-First
translations.landing.about.values.openSource.descript: Our core is open source. You can inspect every line of code that runs on your machine.
